Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State of New York to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden (“MSG” or the “Garden”) so that the revenue raised from putting MSG back on the City’s property tax rolls can be used to provide City services or tax relief to City residents.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS to end the real property tax exemption granted to Madison Square Garden ("MSG" or the "Garden").

Items.Title: Section 202 Supportive Housing Program for the Elderly, Serviam Gardens Senior Housing, 323 East 198th Street, Block: 3291, Lot: p/o 1, The Bronx, Council District No. 15.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Section 202 Supportive Housing Program for the Elderly, Serviam Gardens Senior Housing, 323 East 198th St., The Bronx.
